text: Grymeus is a tiny genus of goblin spiders that is found in Australia. They live in leaf litter and under tree bark. ==References== Harvey, M.S. (1987). Grymeus, a new genus of pouched oonopid spider from Australia (Chelicerata: Araneae). Memoirs of the Museum of Victoria 48: 123–130. Category:Oonopidae Category:Spiders of Australia Category:Araneomorphae genera
title: Grymeus
